subject: Re: [junit] Unit 4.0 release candidate 2 Test ordering
msgSnippet: ... That s a fine goal, and it does get you the best of both worlds. -- Cédric http://testng.org [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
On 1/20/06, David Saff <saff@...> wrote:
>
>
> As much as possible, we've tried to follow the open-closed principle as
> much as possible: the framework is open to extensions that implement
> features like dependencies or groups, without requiring another new
> release of JUnit to support it, or new UI's to display it.


That's a fine goal, and it does get you the best of both worlds.

--
Cédric
http://testng.org


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
